alert.note: Alert for Coastal Bay (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 25 at 10:15AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Bay and south central Washington Counties through 1115 AM EDT/1015 AM CDT/... At 1015 AM EDT/915 AM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles northwest of Lynn Haven to near Panama City Beach to 38 miles south of Santa Rosa Beach. Movement was southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Panama City, Lynn Haven, Panama City Beach, Callaway, Springfield, Hiland Park, Tyndall Air Force Base, Parker, St Andrews State Park, Southport, Cedar Grove, Dirego Park, Beacon Beach, College Station, Gulf Resort Beach, Bayou George, West Panama City, Camp Flowers, Bahama Beach and Biltmore Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
